Title: Titli
Writer: Kanu Behl, Sharat Katariya, Olivia Stewart (script collaborator)
Actors: Shashank Arora, Ranvir Shorey, Shivani Raghuvanshi, Amit Sial
Plot: Titli, the youngest member of a car-jacking brotherhood wants to escape the family business. He and his wife form a pact to set free from their family roots. But is escape possible?
